local_intent: Perceive the dishwasher handle, approach with alignment, set tool yaw to 90 degrees, and verify orientation
assumptions: Dishwasher handle is detectable and reachable
Controller can set and report TCP yaw
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach subtask using DetectObject → ApproachAndAlign → SetTCPYaw(90) with verification via AtOrientation(90), consistent with the global plan before grasping
